newsitem.title: USA: Amscan Holdings Q4 pro forma shr up.
newsitem.headline: Amscan Holdings Q4 pro forma shr up.

text.p: (Dollars in thousands, except per share amounts)

NOTE: (1)Pro forma net income amounts give effect to pro forma income tax provisions at statutory rates (40.5%) assuming the Company had not elected Subchapter S corporation status for those periods offset by a one-time charge for the change in tax status included in the 1996 income tax amounts.

(2)The supplemental pro forma net income amounts give effect to (a) reductions in compensation expenses related to certain terminated employment agreements and compensation payments associated with the termination of such agreements, (b) reductions in compensation expenses for the establishment of the ESOP and the payment of stock bonuses included in the 1996 amounts, (c) amortization of goodwill and the elimination of minority interest related to the 50% acquisition of Am- Source, Inc. as if it were acquired at the beginning of the period presented, (d) reductions in interest expense related to the repayment of bank indebtedness and subordinated indebtedness due to the Principal Stockholder as if it occurred at the beginning of the period presented, and (e) the tax effects of these adjustments at statutory rates (40.5%) assuming the company had not elected Subchapters S corporation status, offset by a one-time charge for the change in tax status included in the 1996 tax amounts.
(3)Shares outstanding do not include 422,400 shares issued on January 8, 1997 in conjunction with the exercise of overallotment option.
